action.action-desc: Mr. Davidson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide States the authority to limit blocking grade rail crossings, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Railroad Responsibility Act of 2025 .

section.header: State authority to limit blocking grade rail crossings

subsection.header: General jurisdiction of Surface Transportation Board
subsection.text: Section 10501(c)(3) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.header: State authority To limit blocking grade rail crossings
subparagraph.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, this title does not preempt a State from the adoption or enactment of any law, regulation, order, or other requirement related to limiting the duration that a railroad carrier may block a grade rail crossing.

subsection.text: Section 20106(a) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: State authority To limit blocking grade rail crossings

subparagraph.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, this title does not preempt a State from the adoption or enactment of any law, regulation, order, or other requirement related to limiting the duration that a railroad carrier may block a grade rail crossing.
In this paragraph, the term State means a State of the United States and the District of Columbia.
